users.comment: Jake, I think you should start hiding your food. They cant steal it if they can't find it!

users.comment: Toby, from personal experience I would stay off campus as you can choose who you live with there! Which is the most important part of your accomodation.

users.comment: From what you have said, it seems like you are doing all you need to. Friends take time and will come as long as you keep putting yourself out there!
